text: @piersmorgan @piersmorgan The acas website currently states that employers can take disciplinary action against employees who do not come into work. https://t.co/oNE1YtU1Ys This is clearly wrong and I urge @BorisJohnson to take more decisive action & provide clarity to save lives!
